The claim was debunked through a reverse: which revealed that the footage was actually filmed in a cemetery in the Tajikistan village of Shurkurgan, not in Thailand.
A brief online report from Radio Free Eu: Radio Liberty (RFERL) described how the graves in the Tajikistan cemetery collapsed after a river overflowed its banks and flooded the area, providing evidence that the video was related to natural causes rather than the rapture.
Another video found using the Yandex sea: seemingly filmed through the perimeter wall, further confirming the location.
The presence of a tall black mast in the: matching part of a previous video, provided additional evidence that the video was indeed from the same location in Tajikistan.
